Class InternshipFilterService

java.lang.Object
sc2002_grpproject.utils.InternshipFilterService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IInternshipFilter
public class InternshipFilterService extends Object implements IInternshipFilter
Implementation of IInternshipFilter interface. Provides concrete filtering operations for internship lists.

    • filterByLevel

      public List<Internship> filterByLevel(List<Internship> internships, InternshipLevel level)
      Filters internships by level. Results are sorted alphabetically by title.
      Specified by:
      filterByLevel in interface IInternshipFilter
      Parameters:
      internships - the list of internships to filter
      level - the internship level to filter by
      Returns:
      a filtered and sorted list of internships

    • filterByCompany

      public List<Internship> filterByCompany(List<Internship> internships, String companyName)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      internships - the list of internships to filter
      companyName - the company name to search for
      Returns:
